asset.title: Hollydays “Des animaux” – Converse Avant-Poste
asset.description:
Hollydays' electro pop is filled with sweet melodies and accents. Watch them play the iconic mezzanine stage at the legendary Café Charbon on Rue Oberkampf, Paris.

Converse Avant-Poste is a long-term celebration of emerging artists & musicians in the region - and will feature gigs and regular films of the most exciting new talent from the city. Stay tuned to Converse YouTube for more coming soon.

Track: "Des animaux" by Hollydays
 
Video director : Vivien Fossez
Shot by : Alexis Rieger, Romain Khun, Thomas Bailly, Vivien Fossez
Sound : Henri Darmancourt
Production : Artbreakerz
asset.author: Converse
